newsitem.title: FRANCE: Second car bomb kills one, wounds 10 in Algiers.
newsitem.headline: Second car bomb kills one, wounds 10 in Algiers.

text.p: A second car bomb explosion on Tuesday evening killed one and wounded 10 in Algiers, an official statement said.

Algerian security forces, in a statement carried by the official Algerian news agency APS, said the car bomb exploded near a children's merry-go-round at Boulevard Khelifa Oulmane in the El Madania district of Algiers.
Residents had said earlier that the explosion had occurred in the city's Ryad el Feth trade centre, less than four hours after a car bomb blast killed at least six people nearby.
The centre is located in the avenue named in the official statement which did not specify whether the merry-go-round was inside the centre or not.
